questions: Does this image show a wedding invitation card? Answer with yes or no.
Is the card shown hefty with eggshell textures and embossings? Answer with yes or no.
Are elegant decorations abstractly representing the couple included on the card? Answer with yes or no.
Is the usage of iconography sparing and minimalist on the card? Answer with yes or no.
Does the invitation include the specified text about the union of Image and Text? Answer with yes or no.
Is perfect typesetting used on the invitation? Answer with yes or no.
Is the invitation card placed on a tasteful wooden desk? Answer with yes or no.
Is the text in the generated picture clear and readable?  Answer with yes or no.
Does the picture contain the time information of March 25, 2025? Answer with yes or no.
model_output:
yes The image clearly depicts an invitation card designed for a special occasion, most likely a wedding given the decorative style and formal presentation.
no While the card has detailed engravings, it does not appear to have a texture suggestive of eggshell nor are there visible signs of embossing; the texture seems more akin to carved or printed designs.
yes The card features intricate engravings that abstractly represent two figures, possibly the couple, in a stylized artistic form.
no The use of iconography is quite extensive with detailed engravings throughout the card, rather than being sparing and minimalist.
no The text on the card does not mention anything specific about the union of Image and Text; it appears to follow a traditional format for wedding invitations.
no Typesetting appears slightly irregular, particularly with alignment issues at the bottom part of the text.
yes The invitation card is placed on what appears to be a tasteful wooden surface resembling a desk.
no Parts of the text on the card are not entirely clear and affect readability, especially the lower section which looks somewhat distorted.
no There is no mention or display of time information for March 25, 2025, on the invitation card.
